here's your answer. Bernie's motto """"Not me, Us"""" is our path forward. Bernie gets things done, and with him at the helm we will vote out the congressmen who aren't representing the will of the people. You might not be happy with that answer, but it is truthful. We need to come together for the good of this country. Our citizens deserve a chance to work for a fair wage and have health care that has literally been a standard in most civilized countries for as much as a hundred years. I am a 49 year old veteran, I very much appreciate what Bernie has done for Veterans, recently passing the Choice legislation Oh and I will leave you with this interesting tidbit from Harry Truman in the 40s, where he us fighting special interests in the name of universal health care. Isn't it time for a level playing field?
